original_text: John’s clothes were made of camel’s hair, and he had a leather belt around his waist. His food was locusts and wild honey.
korean_text: 이 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 음식은 메뚜기와 석청이었더라

sentences.original_text: John's clothes were made of camel's hair
and he had a leather belt around his waist
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 허리에 가죽 띠를 두르고 있었다
